## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I've been hearing a lot about the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, but I'm not entirely sure what it's all about. Can you tell me more about its features and benefits? And how does the Verus Vault add an extra layer of security to VerusIDs?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform that allows users to buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs directly on the blockchain. This platform enables users to advertise their offers to the owner of an ID or NFT, or post the sale of their NFT publicly for everyone to see. The transactions on this platform are executed in a completely decentralized way, without the need for intermediaries. Users can pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, which is still auditable by them. The platform also allows owners to select and share proceeds with value-added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership.

One of the key benefits of the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is that it allows for peer-to-peer transactions without the need for intermediaries. This means that users have complete control over their transactions and can execute them directly with each other.

Regarding the Verus Vault, it's an additional feature that adds an extra layer of security to VerusIDs. With Verus Vault, users can lock their VerusID, which prevents them from spending funds from that identity until it is unlocked again. While the VerusID is locked, users can still stake their funds on the Verus network and earn rewards. They can also still receive funds. The Verus Vault provides an additional layer of protection against theft of a private key, as even if a user's private key is compromised, the thief will not be able to spend the funds if the VerusID is locked.

It's important to note that to enable revocation, recovery, and all Verus Vault capabilities, users need to have one primary identity and at least one revocation/recovery ID configured. This ensures that users have the necessary setup to take advantage of the advanced security features offered by Verus Vault.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
